div.p: Every day is different you can’t really give a normal working day; usually we work between 9:00-5:00 but within our industry something could go wrong and you
could be there for 12 hours but it’s really starting off by going in in the morning and actually checking up on any incidents that have occurred the night before
and if so dealing with the customers and really sort of going out there and actually attending meetings for new business and also dealing with day-to-day
running of the business where you may have problems from staff through to looking at new items that you may need to bring into the company.
